thread.title: ID Software has released the source code to Castle Wolfenste

post.author: zoost
post.body:
http://games.slashdot.org/story/10/09/2 ... e-Released

ID Software has released the source code to Castle Wolfenstein, along with Wolfenstein – Enemy Territory, Return to Castle Wolfenstein single-player, and Return to Castle Wolfenstein multiplayer, under the GPL

post.author: Kamikazee
post.body:
Interesting how even the comments of the linked article point to the earlier Slashdot submission about the source code release.

Don't people read those? It's half the fun of reading SD...
